attributes.action: Reduce the cost of childcare for single parents in full time paid employment
attributes.additional_details: Childcare costs make it extremely hard to work, there should be more available schemes and help for full time single working parents.
attributes.background: I am in full time employment and being forced out of work due to childcare costs which amount to £1,286 PER MONTH. This is extortionate There is no help from the government or any feasible schemes.REVIEW THESE CHARGES AND MAKE IT PAY TO WORK!

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The Government already offers some support for childcare costs. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/help-with-childcare-costs

You could start a new petition asking for a specific change to the way that Government helps parents to meet childcare costs.
